languages.text: "В ином случае я бы рекомендовал предать Сестру битвы суду высшей инстанции... но, учитывая обстоятельства — и добровольное признание — можно обойтись судом непосредственного наследника усопшей. Твоим". {n}Хейнрикс смотрит прямо на вас.{/n}

"In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В ином случае я бы рекомендовал предать Сестру битвы суду высшей инстанции... но, учитывая обстоятельства — и добровольное признание — можно обойтись судом непосредственного наследника усопшей. Твоим". {n}Хейнрикс смотрит прямо на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

"In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

"In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

"In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

languages.text: 「他の事例であれば何であれ、この戦闘修道女を高等裁判にかけることを勧めるところだが…この状況…そして自白を鑑みて…故人の直系相続人の審理で済ませることができる。お前に任せるぞ」{n}ハインリックスは、あなたをまっすぐに見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「他の事例であれば何であれ、この戦闘修道女を高等裁判にかけることを勧めるところだが…この状況…そして自白を鑑みて…故人の直系相続人の審理で済ませることができる。お前に任せるぞ」{n}ハインリックスは、あなたをまっすぐに見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: “如果换做是其他情况，我会建议将这位战斗修女移送最高法庭，接受审判……不过考虑到当前情况特殊，她又已经主动认罪，我认为，姑且可以由死者的直接继承人，也就是你，代行审判之责。”{n}海因里希直视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是其他情况，我会建议将这位战斗修女移送最高法庭，接受审判……不过考虑到当前情况特殊，她又已经主动认罪，我认为，姑且可以由死者的直接继承人，也就是你，代行审判之责。”{n}海因里希直视着你。{/n}

languages.text: « En toute autre circonstance, je recommanderais de traduire la Sœur de Bataille devant une haute cour de justice... mais au vu de la situation – et de cette confession volontaire – nous pouvons nous contenter d'un procès contre l'{mf|héritier direct|héritière directe} de la défunte. Vous. » {n}Heinrix vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En toute autre circonstance, je recommanderais de traduire la Sœur de Bataille devant une haute cour de justice... mais au vu de la situation – et de cette confession volontaire – nous pouvons nous contenter d'un procès contre l'{mf|héritier direct|héritière directe} de la défunte. Vous. » {n}Heinrix vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n}

languages.text: «En cualquier otro caso, recomendaría que la Hermana de Batalla compareciera ante un tribunal superior... pero, dadas las circunstancias y la confesión voluntaria, nos conformamos con un juicio a manos {mf|del heredero|de la heredera} de la difunta... usted». {n}Heinrix te mira directamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier otro caso, recomendaría que la Hermana de Batalla compareciera ante un tribunal superior... pero, dadas las circunstancias y la confesión voluntaria, nos conformamos con un juicio a manos {mf|del heredero|de la heredera} de la difunta... usted». {n}Heinrix te mira directamente.{/n}

languages.text: "In jedem anderen Fall würde ich empfehlen, dass die Schwester der Schlacht vor ein hohes Gericht gestellt wird ... aber angesichts der Umstände – und ihres freiwilligen Geständnisses – tut es wohl auch ein Prozess vor {mf|dem direkten Erben|der direkten Erbin} des Opfers. Euch." {n}Heinrix richtet seinen Blick auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In jedem anderen Fall würde ich empfehlen, dass die Schwester der Schlacht vor ein hohes Gericht gestellt wird ... aber angesichts der Umstände – und ihres freiwilligen Geständnisses – tut es wohl auch ein Prozess vor {mf|dem direkten Erben|der direkten Erbin} des Opfers. Euch." {n}Heinrix richtet seinen Blick auf dich.{/n}

languages.text: "Demem o ki tavsiyem, Harp Rahibesi'nin yüksek mahkeme huzurunda yargılanmasıdır. Fakat şartlara ve itirafa bakıldığında merhumun vârisi de bu yargı sürecini yürütebilir. Yani sen." {n}Heinrix, gözlerini sana dikiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In any other case, I would recommend that the Sister of Battle be tried before a high court... but given the circumstances — and the voluntary confession — we can make do with a trial by the deceased's direct heir. You." {n}Heinrix looks directly at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Demem o ki tavsiyem, Harp Rahibesi'nin yüksek mahkeme huzurunda yargılanmasıdır. Fakat şartlara ve itirafa bakıldığında merhumun vârisi de bu yargı sürecini yürütebilir. Yani sen." {n}Heinrix, gözlerini sana dikiyor.{/n}
